scripts.package:all: npm run package:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package:pad-compatibility=yudi-for-pad && npm run package:pad-compatibility=sheng-for-pad && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-tiramisu && mpm run package:pad-compatibility=hyperos-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=pipa-for-pad && npm run package:pad-compatibility=liuqin-for-pad && npm run netdisk
